website_summaries.verdict: This all in one, everything you need to stay cool, patio misting kit provides you with constant refreshment while relaxing outside.
pros: This system not only provides a wide application of cooling mist, but it also cools and refreshes with energy and environmental conservation in mind
It comes with 20 different misting nozzles and a 50-foot system tube, allowing complete customization
cons: Twenty different nozzles can be overwhelming

customer_reviews.title: I installed my unit using a simple drill with bit, some scissors and a bar stool.
customer_reviews.text: Well i love thw price 20 bucks for 50 feet of tubing. I also love the fact that i could install the tubing first then break areas of the line where i most need the mist to install the T units. My neighbors were amazed with my work today. They all inquired with me on where to purchase the units. Another thing i love is the fact that the T units rotate to angle the mist either toward my house or away from it depending on which way i have the tubing hung. I have attached a short video please enjoy this womens handy work.
customer_reviews.author: Lawleebee

customer_reviews.title: This one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: This misting system is a keeper! I have purchased a few over the past years and this one I love. I did have 2 problems....one of the parts was missing but after reporting it I received a replacement the next day. Thank you very much for that. The 2nd issue I had was the fitting for the outside faucet didn’t fit..... if you run into that problem go to Home Depot and purchase and adapter size 3/4 in FH x 3/4 in MIP (tapped 1/2 in FIP). Give it a try you can’t go wrong. The price is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to assemble. I recommend putting the cut ends in hot water to make it easier to put the nozzles in. I only needed 20 feet so I put a nozzle every 12”, I find that it puts out too much water and leaves everything wet so if you just want a mist, space them at 24”. I tacked it up with cable wire nails. I did not have any issue with the hose connector but make sure that you use the washers.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever put a bad review I try to work it out with the company. We ordered this mister and two of the misters did not work. We wrote the company asking only that they replace the two that didn’t work. No response. We waited a week and I wrote them again and again asked for the two misters that did not work to be replaced. I waited. No response. So we took it down and returned it and I am writing a review that is showing what happened I hope they do better for their customers
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: It comes with everything needed to get your misters going, comes in a small package and easily assembled, some other posts said that the wnds had to be dipped in warm water which wasnt in my case, when the tube was cut at desired position, the tube slipped on mister connectors very well, it comes with teflon tape for the water hose or water socket, but it does seem to still leak but i will fix later , but as others stated it does soak everything which is a good thing, just turn down the water flow to slow down the misters
customer_reviews.author: Dbo

customer_reviews.title: Mists nicely - great cooling and/or watering...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, once you get an attachment that actually fits a standard US hose bib - the one they include doesn't fit at all. Get better zip ties too - the ones in the pack suck. Once you get it connected though, it works great - mist is nice, haven't had a problem with 'in your face' spray... yet. I set it up on our lanai for personal cooling, and aimed a few nozzles toward some plants too - working nicely. I'll let you know if it goes downhill :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Russell

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Put it on a trampoline. The connectors are odd, but you can configure them to a standard outdoor hose if you assemble them properly. I had no issues. I've only had it for 3 days, haven't had any problems yet. Will update if I do.
customer_reviews.author: E. Herd

customer_reviews.title: Yahoo for misters!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My patio instantly started to cool down. Very happy! I just need to get backup on the ladder and figure out how to adjust the misting length. My patio is 10 by 30. I only put them on half of the patio and space them 24" apart. Now I wish I had ran them the full length of the patio and spaced them further apart. The directions didn't mention anything about the misting length, I just read that when I came to leave a review. I also bought a 10' extension hose and wish I had bought one maybe that was 15'. I would highly recommend these for anybody who is considering misters. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I read the poor reviews first & then the more recent & it’s just like one person said, “It looks like they upgraded.” So, I wanted this for the outside of my chicken run & it worked great. It was easy to assemble and it did come with directions. If you happen to need more hose— just make sure you buy a softer plastic & not the harder one as it just doesn’t go with the mister part. I am so happy, my chickens are cooler in this scorching 107 degree heat in California.
customer_reviews.author: Ready for Summer!

customer_reviews.title: Cools the area
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, went out to buy some cable clips, flex hose and installed a second valve with filter to support the tubing. Spaced about every 36”. Would buy again. It works well in the Phoenix area. Does produce some moisture on the ground, but throttle the pressure back a bit. But no different than some of the Restaurants around the city.
customer_reviews.author: Bill from Phoenix Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality. Dont listent to the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: It leaks and leaks good. If you are using a normal garden hose, you will need a PSI reducer as the tubing is a joke of 25 PSI; popped it within 15 min use with my hose at quarter power. Each connector works, but dont try and tighten them or they will leak and spit water constantly. This is not a good product. I went to lowes and got 5oft 200 PSI tubing for 5 bucks. Should have just bought misters and thats it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value but some issues
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money that was missing a very important piece that you put at the end to stop the water from exiting the line. Simply tied to nots at the end. Also the three-quarter inch faucet adapter doesn’t fit anything well.
customer_reviews.author: Master_Therapist

customer_reviews.title: We are Enjoying this Product.
customer_reviews.text: We found that even with the misters turned in all the way there is more than plenty of mist coming out. In our case, we also had to just barely open the water faucet to get the mist we wanted. This is good in that not much water is used. If we want a harder mist, we just turn the water on a little more. It will get you wet though if that's what you want.
customer_reviews.author: lininguff

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful on hot days
customer_reviews.text: Love this system. We installed it near our patio table. It makes a big difference in the air temperature on hot days. Installation takes a little thought on how to make the kit work for your unique situation. Just take your time when figuring it out. Once you insert nozzles into the hosing, you're committed (cannot remove and respace). I also purchased 1/4" hose clips to attach the system under our eaves, which worked out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: As advertised works amazing
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, easy to install, misting heads work great, more than enough hose, my only gripe would be what they give you to mount it, they only give you small zip ties. I went ahead and bought some clams so that I could attach them to my deck. I've had zero issues with functionality and the quick connect / disconnect is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Wade Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cool but wear a bathing suit!
customer_reviews.text: I stretched this across the patio using rebar driven into the ground. Then I slid white PVC pipe over the rebar tall enough to walk under. I then used a smaller pvc tube as a cross bar supported by a long stiff curtain rod.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit but not all the nozzles mist well
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to install and setup but 3 out of the 10 nozzles squirt the water in more of a stream like pattern instead of actually misting the water. This creates puddles on the floor and difficult to sit near it without getting soaked. I see ZERO way to contact the seller regarding this issue or a way to request replacement nozzles unless I want to return the item. The system is fully installed so thats the last thing I want to do....
customer_reviews.author: PapaVolume

customer_reviews.title: Like these!
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't that hot this summer so we didn't get to use them much. They'll soak you for sure, so turn the water down! Gonna leave them up for next summer. These are a must do in the South.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: These misters work great cooling our barn. We were missing one nozzle. I contacted the seller and he replied very quickly telling me he is sending one out to us immediately. Great customer service! And the horses love their cool barn!
customer_reviews.author: Judy W

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing Mister
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and add a mister to a patio. Refreshing on a hot day. I hung it down the middle. This year I just used a garden hose for connection, next year I'll up grade to a direct PVC pipe connection so it looks better. My guests loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the ease of set up
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy generic mist systems already assembled but now this easy to assemble great product changed everything. You decide where you want to place misters and the length of tubing is fantastic. Quick and simple to install.
customer_reviews.author: Cindydat

customer_reviews.title: Splash not mist
customer_reviews.text: Got this so I could have a mister for my doggie when he is out side, it was not easy to assemble and I followed instructions on soaking the tubing, still popping off and it was not a mist more of a splash.
customer_reviews.author: DC the Queen

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work,  and assembly is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely horrible!!! Don’t waste your money! Comes totally unassembled. Directions are almost non existent. And you have to add to it just to get it to work a little.
customer_reviews.author: tbb

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not great. Heavy mist
customer_reviews.text: Went together well. All the pieces were there. Instructions are clearly written by someone in China :-) it definitely puts out a mist, but way too much. We have these about 8.5 feet in the air near our dining table outside. Everything below them was soaked within a couple minutes. We attempted to dial back the flow of water but that didn’t help very much. These would be great if they were 20 feet in the air over an area needing to be cooled down
customer_reviews.author: Vince311

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me cool and 106 degree  weather
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why they asked me what warmth is there supposed to keep you cool so I gave warmth one star. Pretty easy to install just need a hammer and scissors
customer_reviews.author: jesse jay blair

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Put together and installed very easily. Finding the right pressure is going to take some experimenting. You will need mounts to install.
customer_reviews.author: lpenn

customer_reviews.title: Horses Love It !
customer_reviews.text: Actually, this is keeping my one medicine hat paint alive, she's a pinky and over heats so much easier. They all enjoy cooling off and I have a pond but up near the house this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Rattlebone

customer_reviews.title: Not so cool
customer_reviews.text: So I cant get in touch with anyone on this matter. I'm missing pieces from the box. I would love to give stars but I can't use this product. Without stopper!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble.  Comes apart easily
customer_reviews.text: Have to cut each piece and put nozzle on Good luck with that. Even after putting in warm or even hot water. They pop off regularly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: First class product complete kit with everything you need to get cool!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent deal. Quality fittings and so easy to install! This transformed my deck from a fiery furnace to a cool, refreshing oasis! Depending how you install these and where your water supply is, you may need to get more pipe, but it’s easy to find and very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrsnapln

customer_reviews.title: All the parts were there!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a hot back or front yard, all the parts were in the package and easy to hook up and assemble. We cooled off our back yard in under an hour and a half!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a cheap way to put in misters. The nozzle's release a thick mist that gets everything wet. Not worth the money but what can you expect for $15?
customer_reviews.author: E. Lau

customer_reviews.title: Revised Review-Turned out to be great
customer_reviews.text: Missing a part the end cap. I found it! my mistake. It works great, I would have gave it 5 stars, but instructions should be more detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisamarie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Was super easy to install. The only “bad” thing is that the cable ties are too small and break easily. It feels so nice in the heat!
customer_reviews.author: carstami

customer_reviews.title: Mist not fine enough
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. The mist is not nearly fine enough. You stand under it for a few seconds and you’re soaked. Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Reitz

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you a lot cooler
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was 50 foot. Only thing I wasnt expecting was I had to cut and assemble it. But for the length and price it was worth the time to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Shiner

customer_reviews.title: Not a very strong mist
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and easy to put together. But the the spray of mist coming out is a joke and some of the spouts are faulty and only drip with no spray
customer_reviews.author: Kat M.

customer_reviews.title: Mister works but needs help
customer_reviews.text: The mister system idea is GREAT, even though two of the tees were faulty. One leaked water at both ends and the other sprayed a steady stream of water-no mist. We are sending the two tees back, hopefully two new ones will be returned. The system was very easy to install & assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Carson

customer_reviews.title: Works but too much output.
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to work with and do not appear to leak at the connectors/misters. BUT, they put out way too much water and drench anything nearby. And yes I have them connected properly. After less than 3 minutes the cushions about 7-8 feet away were soaked. These will be great to water ferns, etc but not good for hanging on a patio as only a cooling system.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne White

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great an dis super easy to install! I would recommend getting some cheap wire mounts to mount the tubing where you need it, but other than that it comes with everything needed even the plumbing tape. I definitely recommend using a cup of hot water for the tubing as stated in the directions. It makes everything 10x easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Herren

customer_reviews.title: Will not work on U.S. hose bibbs
customer_reviews.text: It clearly shows that it will work but it does not. Other's have said this, yet I figured I'd try. No way...
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described! Great product at a great price! A+++
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: wasted money
customer_reviews.text: This spits out too much water, pools water. Whats the warranty on this?
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Cooling in the Az heat
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything in image. After I installed them we didn't have any issues. In the az heat these are awesome. Just remember to turn off when you aren't going to be around.
customer_reviews.author: ABDULAZIZ ALKHOWAITER

customer_reviews.title: Super easy for misting roof in heat wave
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to mist my roof during a heat wave. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: EddieLips

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and works!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, no leaking, great spray/mist, worked amazing for Fourth of July!
customer_reviews.author: Sakneer

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting xtra nozzels
customer_reviews.text: These work great, I bought 2 sets & connected together, not enough nozzelsls for the size of the hoze though & when I atempted to Purchase xtra nozels, I was told I can get xtras conditional on writting a good review lol! Not cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a better quality but it sprayed not misted
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Disruption

customer_reviews.title: High performance and no clogging cooling water misters
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and misters still performing as designed. Cools small areas at least 10 degrees!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Pizza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!  Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: Thai was super super easy to install. My only complaint is they didn’t end the tacks to install. Fortunately we had some.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: quick setup. great for grand kids and doesn't take up room to store
customer_reviews.author: shogan

customer_reviews.title: Won't connect to hose/faucet
customer_reviews.text: The 3/4 to 1/2 adapter simply doesn't work. It goes on maybe 2 turns and leaks like crazy. You will need to go to the hardware store and buy a 3/4 to 1/2 adapter in order to use the product. Had I not already cut and installed the system, I would definitely be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H

customer_reviews.title: Cooling Down with Misty
customer_reviews.text: It's in service and working as stated, we use it to cool off this summer in Az. Works well .
customer_reviews.author: CaptRon

customer_reviews.title: Item
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the item so I can't write and review
customer_reviews.author: cordova1220

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & pips part easily.
customer_reviews.text: It was not worth the money. It keeps popping apart & was awkward to put together. Also, hose very flimsy & get holes in it easily. Going to buy another brand that is already assembled. Bought one last yr & still works perfectly. Got suckered into buying something cheap. I have now learned.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste B.

customer_reviews.title: Tie off the end of the line!
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap and convenient way to water my garden and generate some coolness in the southern summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Sairynity

customer_reviews.title: work well even with hard water
customer_reviews.text: work like a charm, keeps the bunnies cool in the 100 degree hear
customer_reviews.author: merryraye

customer_reviews.title: Do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, puts off lots of water. Wish there was a way to decrease the flow out of each nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and works great, with minimal water needed.
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: nozzle clogged one by one
customer_reviews.text: Firstly what is WARMTH in comment suggestion? Secondly EASY TO INSTALL and EASY TO ASSEMBLE are the same comments. After 10 days of using, the 10th nozzle clogged. Since the pin holes are so small, I had no way to clear it. I abandoned the 10th one. 10 days later the 9th nozzle clogged.
customer_reviews.author: Mario M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat this product. Easy to install. Work great on hot days
customer_reviews.author: cecilia sclafani

customer_reviews.title: i would
customer_reviews.text: i would not know as this also just sits around collecting dust:)
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Leone

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, WELL made product. Will buy more sets in future. Thanks for making a great product
customer_reviews.author: Mark Littfin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install don’t be intimidated by all the parts it’s reslly simple.
customer_reviews.text: Great for putting around fence or patio to keep air cool. Also great for gardens. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: N/a
customer_reviews.text: Got my backyard patio works great keeping temperature a little cooler.
customer_reviews.author: chris allshouse

customer_reviews.title: The 3/4 inch garden hose connector does not fit on a garden hose.  You need to buy a new connector
customer_reviews.text: The misters cannot be adjusted so it comes out in a heavy mist soaking the ground. The hose connecting to the T needs to be secured with the small ties inclosed in the package. there is nothing in the instructions telling you that.
customer_reviews.author: Janice A. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Easy, affordable and great addition to our backyard!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t ever write reviews but I felt compelled to write one because I LOVE THESE! Set up within minutes, easy to assemble and customize to your own patio. And it kept us so cool in this hot heat! A must for your backyard if you live in hot climate! I just might buy a second one for our pergola!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put up. It works great. We have 100 degree days and this is wonderful to cool down our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Wrong thread on coupler
customer_reviews.text: As others stated the coupler will not screw onto a garden hose or water spigot. Wrong threads and this piece is fairly difficult to find to make the system work.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Green

customer_reviews.title: Awesome misters
customer_reviews.text: 5 minutes and you are ready to go. Great for hot days when your camping. Everyone loved them. You barely need to turn the water on and they will work beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ratz

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Low price
customer_reviews.text: Does not attach to regular us hose bibs. Attachments are great but a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Francis G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! For the price you can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wanted something to cool down our porch and this solved the issue. It’s a little more involved to install than I thought it would be but for the price you can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mozena

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. Must be dipped in hot water to put together but it’s worth the money you save assembling it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: easy and works great
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up, took 15 minutes ! Works great, when our deck is 95 degrees it brings the temperature down 10 degrees !
customer_reviews.author: Ron Zucker

customer_reviews.title: Keep cool
customer_reviews.text: Haven't put together yet but suppose to be 90 today so here goes
customer_reviews.author: michael vandenbussche

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: It didn't last more than 1 week. I bought it to keep my chickens cool during the hot summer days but sadly after a couple uses the nozzles started to fail and once one of them breaks down you lose all the pressure and the thing is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I want
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a very fair price. Would recommend to anyone. Certainly helping us to survive the heat!
customer_reviews.author: Tickytocka

customer_reviews.title: Gteat value
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and use it for the plant .
customer_reviews.author: Tony Pat

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up easily just as stated in the instructions and works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try installing less can always add more
customer_reviews.text: There were too many nozzles installed. We followed the directions on spacing but turns out we could have done every other. Very powerful! Worked great in July & Aug in Florida
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: You have to play with it to get the desired effect.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why i waited soo long to buy this ..Its amazing!! Easy set up and works great!!
customer_reviews.author: sandra raper

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I used in a greenhouse, and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Deeter

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to install. Good quality. Easily to redirect.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the pain
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful, just had issues with assembling it. Water needs to be scolding hot, and I had blister from twisting on hose. Also it's doesn't have a 3/4 attachment for outside spicket.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Topor

customer_reviews.title: Product is okay not the best
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and assemble however the most was too strong and I had puddles of water on the chairs and tables I had around the misters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The hose connection is poorly made and leaks so much that you can’t get enough pressure to get a full mist. Half of the connections don’t mist at all and many only create drips rather than mist.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia seixas

customer_reviews.title: Leaking sprayer upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: One of the parts leaks i would like a replacement. The other ones are great and very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Tubing is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Its not high quality tubing it is very thin and swells up 2 and a half times its size stretches and sags down very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Stephen maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Soaks everything
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend this very hard to put sprayer ends on and it soaks everything .
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly, for what I needed it for!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and installed it on a industrial sized fan, to cool off a large area...worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jerrick Hart

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product, very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Over all it is great. I had two misters that wouldn't mist they were more of a jet stream. I set up to have those replaced. Once I get it going right I'll probably buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Reed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works just like we expected. It makes sitting outside in the hot Texas summer tolerable !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking nozzle.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with the product but one of the nozzles is leaking water. I’m wondering if you can send me one of the metal mists nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: adan hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Reviews aren't near high enough for how easy, effective and inexpensive this is. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: T S

customer_reviews.title: Cool mist easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I hooked it up and was misting away in minutes. Very low price for being comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: johanna bencivenga

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but does not mist/sprays water
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but does not mist/sprays too much water. Soaked our entire patio versus misting water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy extra nozzles
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully but water quality affects performance. Keep spare heads on had to use when cleaning dirty ones in vinegar
customer_reviews.author: John Castleberry

customer_reviews.title: Misting System
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to install misting nozzles. Received without any delays. I would definitely buy again from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product .
customer_reviews.text: Great product I’d get another set . When I need one. I played a video to show how it turned out under the tiki hut
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: REDTRON 32.8FT Mist Cooling System, Patio Misting System with 10 Misting Nozzles, Outdoor Misting Kit for Patio Garden Greenhouse Trampoline for Waterpark
feature_bullets: Upgraded Misting Kit: REDTRON patio mister includes 32.8FT UV-resistant flexible tubing, 3/4” outdoor tap connector, 10 metal misting nozzles, 9 push-lock tee joints and Telfon Tape. Just with a simple Cut and Push, you can then DIY your cooling fun in hot summer.

Easy Assembling：Comes with push-lock Tee joints, REDTRON patio mist cooling system can be assembled within 10 minutes, delivering fine mist to effectively cool the surrounding air temperature up to 20 degree.

Fine Misting Effect: No need to worry about dripping for the misting area. The upgraded alloy misting nozzles (0.04mm) create fine mist which is perfect for outdoor water playing and let you enjoy the fantastic outdoor sight in hot summer.

US Standard 3/4” Alloy Metal Adapter: Comes with an US Standard 3/4” alloy metal adapter, REDTRON outdoor cooling system can be connected to male 3/4" threaded outdoor faucet, garden hose (connecting part is male 3/4" threaded)

Wildly Application: REDTRON outdoor cooling system is also a perfect garden irrigation kit. The misting kit is great for bonsai and potted fruit, for family homes, hotels, clubs, offices and other plants of intelligent care, swimming pool misting fog cooling, mist mosquito system and so on.
